articles.content: The Realme Narzo 30A was launched on February 24, and priced at Rs. 8,999. It joins a long list of budget-friendly smartphones under Rs. 10,000. How does the Realme Narzo 30A measure up in this categ… [+8774 chars]

articles.title: PUBG Mobile Team Focusing on Re-Launching the Game in India, Publisher Krafton Says: Report - Gadgets 360
articles.description: PUBG Mobile publisher Krafton says that the team is focusing on bringing the Indian version to the country, according to a new report. It says that PUBG: New State is not a priority for India as of now which is why pre-registrations for the new game are not o…
articles.content: PUBG Mobile India team is focusing on bringing the Indian version of the game to the country, a representative of the game's publisher Krafton has reportedly said. According to the report, Krafton ha… [+2678 chars]
